titleStmt.title: The honest whore with, the humours of the patient man, and the longing vvife. Tho: Dekker.
titleStmt.author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.
Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by V[alentine] S[immes and others] for Iohn Hodgets, and are to be solde at his shop in Paules church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Written in collaboration with Thomas Middleton.
The first word of the title is xylographic.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
